rundown: 1-2 L vs Baltimore Orioles Grant Holmes: 6.0 innings, 2 earned runs, 4 hits, 1 HR, 5 strikeouts Batters: Sean Murphy (2 hits - 4 AB, 1 HR, 1 RBI) Jurickson Profar (2 hits - 4 AB) Stuart Fairchild (2 hits - 3 AB) The Braves fell short against the Baltimore Orioles, managing only one run despite a solid offensive effort. Key highlights include Sean Murphy's home run, which accounted for the Braves' only run, and a strong performance from Grant Holmes on the mound, who struck out five batters. The Braves out-hit the Orioles 7 to 6 but could not capitalize on their opportunities, leading to the narrow defeat.
